QAPair.Question: What is (are) Diverticulitis - what to ask your doctor ?
QAPair.Answer: Diverticulitis is inflammation of small pouches (diverticula) that can form in the walls of your large intestine. This leads to fever and pain in your belly, most often the lower left part. Below are some questions you may want to ask your health care provider about diverticulitis.
